CustomPiwikJs.PluginDescription: Allows any plugin to extend the Piwik JavaScript Tracking file (piwik.js) and add new functionnality and website measurement capabilities.
CustomPiwikJs.DiagnosticPiwikJsNotWritable: The Piwik JavaScript tracker file "/piwik.js" is not writable which means other plugins cannot extend the JavaScript tracker. In the future even some core features might not work as expected.
CustomPiwikJs.DiagnosticPiwikJsMakeWritable: We recommend to Piwik.js writable by running this command: %s
